result.eng: Can you solve the problem?
result.ga: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteachCan you solve the problem?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat an ḟaḋb a réiteaċCan you solve the problem?

result.eng: Have the problems been overcome yet?
result.ga: Ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.orig: Ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.html: Ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?
result.ponchtml: Ar sáraíoḋ na faḋbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?

result.eng: A lot of problems are associated with it.
result.ga: Baineann go leor fadhbanna leis
result.orig: Baineann go leor fadhbanna leis
result.html: Baineann go leor fadhbanna leisA lot of problems are associated with it.
result.ponchtml: Baineann go leor faḋbanna leisA lot of problems are associated with it.

result.eng: The problem was growing from year to year.
result.ga: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.orig: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.html: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟaḋb ag fás ó ḃliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.

result.eng: We worked together to fix the problem.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteachWe worked together to fix the problem.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag obair as láṁa a ċéile ċun an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe worked together to fix the problem.

result.eng: What is the cure to the problem?
result.ga: Cad é leigheas na faidhbe
result.orig: Cad é leigheas na faidhbe
result.html: Cad é leigheas na faidhbeWhat is the cure to the problem?
result.ponchtml: Cad é leiġeas na faiḋbeWhat is the cure to the problem?

result.eng: What is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?
result.ga: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leat
result.orig: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leat
result.html: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leatWhat is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?
result.ponchtml: Cad é réiteaċ na faiḋbe dar leatWhat is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?

result.eng: We must solve the problem.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteachWe must solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe must solve the problem.

result.eng: That caused us problems.
result.ga: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinn
result.orig: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinn
result.html: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.
result.ponchtml: Ċoṫaiġ sé sin faḋbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.

result.eng: How will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ga: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.orig: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.html: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ḋéileálfaiḋ an rialtas le faḋb na díḟostaíoċtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?

result.eng: How can we overcome these problems?
result.ga: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.orig: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.html: Conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárúHow can we overcome these problems?
result.ponchtml: Conas is féidir linn na faḋbanna seo a ẛárúHow can we overcome these problems?

result.eng: What problem do you have?
result.ga: Cén fhadhb atá agat
result.orig: Cén fhadhb atá agat
result.html: Cén fhadhb atá agatWhat problem do you have?
result.ponchtml: Cén ḟaḋb atá agatWhat problem do you have?

result.eng: This is a big problem.
result.ga: Fadhb mhór é seo
result.orig: Fadhb mhór é seo
result.html: Fadhb mhór é seoThis is a big problem.
result.ponchtml: Faḋb ṁór é seoThis is a big problem.

result.eng: How to tackle the drugs problem?
result.ga: Conas dul i ngleic le fadhb na ndrugaí
result.orig: Conas dul i ngleic le fadhb na ndrugaí
result.html: Conas dul i ngleic le fadhb na ndrugaíHow to tackle the drugs problem?
result.ponchtml: Conas dul i ngleic le faḋb na ndrugaíHow to tackle the drugs problem?

result.eng: Young people's problems.
result.ga: Fadhbanna an aosa óig
result.orig: Fadhbanna an aosa óig
result.html: Fadhbanna an aosa óigYoung people's problems.
result.ponchtml: Faḋbanna an aosa óigYoung people's problems.

result.eng: Young people's problems.
result.ga: Fadhbanna na ndaoine óga
result.orig: Fadhbanna na ndaoine óga
result.html: Fadhbanna na ndaoine ógaYoung people's problems.
result.ponchtml: Faḋbanna na ndaoine ógaYoung people's problems.

result.eng: The problem can't be solved.
result.ga: Ní féidir an fhadhb a leigheas
result.orig: Ní féidir an fhadhb a leigheas
result.html: Ní féidir an fhadhb a leigheasThe problem can't be solved.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir an ḟaḋb a leiġeasThe problem can't be solved.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ga: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteachHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċreid sé a ḟusaċt a ḃí sé an ḟaḋb a réiteaċHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.

result.eng: I have the problem under control.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb faoi smacht agam
result.orig: Tá an fhadhb faoi smacht agam
result.html: Tá an fhadhb faoi smacht agamI have the problem under control.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb faoi smaċt agamI have the problem under control.

result.eng: The problem is solved, thanks to you.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsa
result.orig: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsa
result.html: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsaThe problem is solved, thanks to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb réitiṫe a ḃuí leatsaThe problem is solved, thanks to you.

result.eng: This problem is tormenting me.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chrá
result.orig: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chrá
result.html: Tá an fhadhb seo do mo chráThis problem is tormenting me.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb seo do mo ċráThis problem is tormenting me.

result.eng: We have many problems.
result.ga: Tá go leor fadhbanna againn
result.orig: Tá go leor fadhbanna againn
result.html: Tá go leor fadhbanna againnWe have many problems.
result.ponchtml: Tá go leor faḋbanna againnWe have many problems.

result.eng: I am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ga: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.orig: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.html: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má ḃíonn faḋbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.

result.eng: We have finally overcome the problems.
result.ga: Tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.orig: Tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.html: Tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadhWe have finally overcome the problems.
result.ponchtml: Tá na faḋbanna cloíte againn faoi ḋeireaḋWe have finally overcome the problems.

result.eng: That has been a problem for a long time.
result.ga: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an lá
result.orig: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an lá
result.html: Tá sé sin ina fhadhb le fada an láThat has been a problem for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin ina ḟaḋb le fada an láThat has been a problem for a long time.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
